fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Varesa generally prefers Iansan over Bennett, but they can be exchangeable. Chevreuse overloaded teams are recommended most when Chevreuse is C6. Ororon can also replace Iansan or Fischl to hold __Scroll of the Hero of Cinder City__.
